bio: Dr. Cheryl Lentz is a intl best selling award winning author known for her writings on The Golden Palace Theory of Management and refractive thinking. University of Phoenix Troy State University University of Illinois- Urbana Champaign University of Phoenix, Embry Riddle University, Walden University, University of the Rockies Faculty The Lentz Leadership Institute Publisher, Professor, Managing Editor of the Refractive Thinker
